title: Who Was Mohammed Deif, Hamas Military Wing Chief Confirmed Dead By Israel
content: Mohammed Deif, the head of Hamas' military wing, was killed in an airstrike in Gaza last month, the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) have confirmed. Deif was believed to be a key architect of the October 7 attack, which killed 1,195 people in Israel.
summary: Mohammed Deif, the head of Hamas' military wing, was killed in an airstrike in Gaza last month, the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) have confirmed. Deif was believed to be a key architect of the October 7 attack, which killed 1,195 people in Israel.

title: OpenAI Says Dedicated To Safety In Letter To US Lawmakers
content: The startup sought to reassure lawmakers of its commitment to safety after five senators raised questions about OpenAI's safety policies.
summary: The startup sought to reassure lawmakers of its commitment to safety after five senators raised questions about OpenAI's safety policies.

title: Blinken Urges End To "Escalatory Actions" For All Parties In Middle East
content: The strike that killed Ismail Haniyeh came just hours after Israel said it had killed a top Hezbollah commander in a retaliatory strike on the Lebanese capital Beirut. The killings took place as regional tensions were already inflamed by the war.
summary: The strike that killed Ismail Haniyeh came just hours after Israel said it had killed a top Hezbollah commander in a retaliatory strike on the Lebanese capital Beirut. The killings took place as regional tensions were already inflamed by the war.

title: Weeks After "Blue Screen Of Death", Microsoft Suffers New Outage
content: The tech giant said it was a DDoS attack that floods a service with traffic in order to bring them to a standstill.
summary: The tech giant said it was a DDoS attack that floods a service with traffic in order to bring them to a standstill.

title: Hamas Military Chief Mohammed Deif Killed In Gaza Strike: Israel
content: The Israeli military on Thursday announced that Hamas military chief Mohammed Deif had been killed in a strike it carried out last month in Gaza's southern area of Khan Yunis.
summary: The Israeli military on Thursday announced that Hamas military chief Mohammed Deif had been killed in a strike it carried out last month in Gaza's southern area of Khan Yunis.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy Accuses Kamala Harris Of Leaning Into 'Identity Politics'
content: The 38-year-old Indian-American biotech entrepreneur drew a comparison between Harris' heritage and his own to share his views on the subject.
summary: The 38-year-old Indian-American biotech entrepreneur drew a comparison between Harris' heritage and his own to share his views on the subject.

title: Kerala Police Has Warned Against 'Dark Tourism'. Know What It Is
content: Dark tourism has gained global attention in recent years, partly thanks to TV shows like Chernobyl and The Dark Tourist.
summary: Dark tourism has gained global attention in recent years, partly thanks to TV shows like Chernobyl and The Dark Tourist.

title: Iran Holds Funeral For Hamas Chief Haniyeh, Calls For "Revenge" On Israel
content: The Islamic republic's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei will lead the prayers for Haniyeh ahead of his burial in Doha, having earlier threatened a "harsh punishment" for his killing.
summary: The Islamic republic's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei will lead the prayers for Haniyeh ahead of his burial in Doha, having earlier threatened a "harsh punishment" for his killing.

title: UK PM To Meet Cops Over Stabbing Attack As Protesters Chant "Save Our Kids"
content: There were angry scenes in London on Wednesday evening as thousands of anti-immigration protesters gathered near Starmer's Downing Street office and residence chanting "save our kids" and "we want our country back".
summary: There were angry scenes in London on Wednesday evening as thousands of anti-immigration protesters gathered near Starmer's Downing Street office and residence chanting "save our kids" and "we want our country back".

title: Voting For Kamala Harris's Democratic Nomination Set To Begin Today
content: Less than two weeks after Joe Biden ended his re election bid, his 52-year-old vice president is in full control of the party, having emerged as the only Democrat in the running to challenge Republican Donald Trump in November.
summary: Less than two weeks after Joe Biden ended his re election bid, his 52-year-old vice president is in full control of the party, having emerged as the only Democrat in the running to challenge Republican Donald Trump in November.

title: Who Was Ismail Haniyeh, Hamas Leader Killed In Iran
content: Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh was assassinated in Tehran, Iran, on July 31, the Palestinian militant group said.
summary: Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh was assassinated in Tehran, Iran, on July 31, the Palestinian militant group said.

title: Co-Pilot Faints On Lisbon-Bound Flight, Rare "Red Alert" Issued
content: The Airbus A320 aircraft issued a rare "red alert," which is an obligatory stop of operations as a safety precaution, as the medical situation developed.
summary: The Airbus A320 aircraft issued a rare "red alert," which is an obligatory stop of operations as a safety precaution, as the medical situation developed.

title: Mexican Drug Lord El Chapo's Son Didn't Kidnap Fellow Gangster, Says Lawyer
content: The son of jailed Sinaloa Cartel kingpin Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman did not kidnap drug lord Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada, the Guzman family's lawyer said on Wednesday, following reports Guzman's son had betrayed Zambada to the United States.
summary: The son of jailed Sinaloa Cartel kingpin Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman did not kidnap drug lord Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada, the Guzman family's lawyer said on Wednesday, following reports Guzman's son had betrayed Zambada to the United States.

title: India Advises Citizens To Avoid All Non-Essential Travel To Lebanon
content: Amid escalating tensions in the region, Indian Embassy in Lebanon has advised Indians to avoid all non-essential travel to Lebanon.
summary: Amid escalating tensions in the region, Indian Embassy in Lebanon has advised Indians to avoid all non-essential travel to Lebanon.

title: Half Of Dementia Cases Can Be Curbed By Addressing These Key Risk Factors
content: Millions of cases of dementia could be prevented or delayed by reducing a range of risk factors such as smoking or air pollution, according to a major new study, though outside experts warn that such measures can only go so far.
summary: Millions of cases of dementia could be prevented or delayed by reducing a range of risk factors such as smoking or air pollution, according to a major new study, though outside experts warn that such measures can only go so far.

title: Iran Leader Ayatollah To Lead Funeral Prayers For Hamas Chief Ismail Haniyeh
content: Iran was set to hold funeral processions on Thursday for Hamas political chief Ismail Haniyeh ahead of his burial in Doha after he was killed in a strike in Tehran blamed on Israel.
summary: Iran was set to hold funeral processions on Thursday for Hamas political chief Ismail Haniyeh ahead of his burial in Doha after he was killed in a strike in Tehran blamed on Israel.

title: Kate Middleton Had Emergency Surgery To Remove Lump As A Teen, Says New Book
content: The surgery left a three-inch scar which several people noticed on Ms Middleton's first solo engagement over two decades ago.
summary: The surgery left a three-inch scar which several people noticed on Ms Middleton's first solo engagement over two decades ago.

title: How Undercover Agents Posed As Sex Buyers At Comic Con To Rescue Victims
content: Undercover officers posing as sex buyers at last week's Comic-Con event in California rescued human trafficking victims, including a 16-year-old girl, and made multiple arrests, prosecutors said Wednesday.
summary: Undercover officers posing as sex buyers at last week's Comic-Con event in California rescued human trafficking victims, including a 16-year-old girl, and made multiple arrests, prosecutors said Wednesday.

title: "If I Win, He Resigns. If He Wins...": Elon Musk Dares Venezuela President
content: Billionaire Elon Musk has accepted a challenge to fight Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro on national television. The SpaceX and Tesla chief, and the owner of the social network X, took to his platform to respond to Maduro's challenge.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk has accepted a challenge to fight Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro on national television. The SpaceX and Tesla chief, and the owner of the social network X, took to his platform to respond to Maduro's challenge.

title: 17-Year-Old Male Charged With Murder Of 3 Girls In UK Knife Attack
content: A 17-year-old male was charged on Thursday with the murder of three girls and the attempted murder of 10 more people in a knife attack at a Taylor Swift-themed dance class, UK prosecutors said.
summary: A 17-year-old male was charged on Thursday with the murder of three girls and the attempted murder of 10 more people in a knife attack at a Taylor Swift-themed dance class, UK prosecutors said.
